amendment.description: Amendment sought to strike the consideration of technological feasibility when determining national ambient air quality standards to preserve health based standards.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 3 printed in House Report 114-607 to strike the consideration of technological feasibility when determining national ambient air quality standards to preserve health based standards.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Pallone amendment (A003) Failed by recorded vote: 169 - 242 (Roll no. 278).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Pallone amendment (A003) Failed by recorded vote: 169 - 242 (Roll no. 278).
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A003) offered by Mr. Pallone.
